name: Global China Cash
description: CNC (Global China Cash), Based on BTS system release, a digital currency anchored by legal currency. That is, 1CNC = 1CNY, CNC has the characteristics of constant value, large supply, fast transfer speed and low transfer cost. Strictly abide by the 1:1 reserve guarantee system. Every circulation of a CNC has an equivalent legal currency reserve as a guarantee of cash, so there is no need to worry about not being able to cash.
